title: The Ralfy The Plug Interview: Drakeo's Murder, Adam22 Beef, OTM, Stinc Team Running LA & More
description:
Ralfy has a few things he wanted to clear up with Adam, like expecting to have his music pushed every time he drops and so forth. Adam responds to everything!
-----
00:00 Intro
2:29 - Stinc team is the most hated group in LA?
7:30 - Ralfy’s feelings being hurt over Adam and fans saying he was just high and ranting on Twitter 
8:05 - Ralfy feels like he shouldn’t have to hit up Adam to be posted if Adam genuinely f*cks with him and is tapped in 
9:24 - Adam on expecting Ralfy to send a video to be posted after letting him know he would post him for free, “How can you expect something out another man?”
13:06 - Ralfy speaks on feeling like Adam used Drakeo and the Stinc Team to get tapped in with the streets
15:40 - Yung Angel turns up on Adam for not calling Ralfy after receiving his number, heated argument
22:42 - OTM keeping the truth alive, falling out with Remble
27:50 - Ralfy calls Kendrick out for having a lazy rollout and not putting artists on from LA
43:03 - The lawsuit against Live Nation, they need to be held accountable for not securing the venue 
53:21 - Making his distrokid after he got out of jail, making about 60k a month off streaming 
1:01:33 - Blazzy getting the OTM interview soon, Ralfy on hitting up Akademiks, SayCheese
1:02:51 - Spending 80k of his money for Drakeo's arrangements 
1:05:43 - Skateboard P Deluxe, I heart Ralfy deluxe, Drakeo tape this summer “Keep the truth alive”, Instagram being hard on Ralfy 

-----
